errorElementosLista: There is no item to show in the list.
notificaErrorDesarrollador: An unexpected error has occurred, please contact the developer.
errorFaltanPermisosEscritura: Writing permission is required before continuing. Try again later.
textoAnimacionDescarga:
Download in progress: Please, wait
until it finish.
textoAnimacionAperturaConexion: Loading the remote resource, please wait.
errorConexionFicheroRemoto: Can not connect to the remote resource. Check your Internet connection and try again. If the problem persists, the resource may not be available.
textoExitoCapturaPantalla: The screenshot has been saved successfully.
errorDescarga: The download has not been completed, check your Internet connection and try again.
mensajeErrorValidacionCamposVaciosCalcul: Any of the required fields is empty
mensajeErrorValidacionCamposFormatoCalcu: Some field has an invalid format.
mensajeErrorValidacionCamposAjustesCalcu: Any field required in the settings]]> is empty or has an invalid format.
moduloSinRecursosSeccionSeleccionada: The selected module does not have resources for that section.
sincronizandoContenidoAplicacion:
Syncing the app content
with the server…
valorEntradaFueraRango: Some parameter has a value outside the valid range.
exitoSincronizarBaseDatos: The app content has been correctly synchronized with the server.
errorSincronizarBaseDatos: The app content has not been synchronized with the server.
obteniendoVersionRecursoRemoto: The app is getting necessary data before starting the download. Try again later.
reintentandoObtencionVersionRecursoRemot: Retrying obtaining the remote resource version…
avisoErrorObtenerVersionRecursoRemoto: Error getting the version of the remote resource. Retry the operation again.
errorDescargaPrerrequisitos: At this time, the necessary requirements to request the download are not available (there are too many downloads in progress). Try again later.
errorRecursoRegistradoLocalNoExiste: The resource downloaded that HepApp tries to view has been manually erased or by another application, or external storage is not available.
tipComenzarSolicitandoDescargaRecurso:
Start by requesting the download of the
resource using from the lower toolbar the
same control as the one shown on the right.
